Three Kerbals strapped to the top of a 3 seater pod with parachute and ladders around bottom and 3 ladders leading up to each dare-devil seat. (this for Drag effect and fun

Look Familiar ? I bet most of you have done it

MK16-XL Parachute

MK1-2 Command Pod

Rockomax Brand Decoupler

Inverted Rockomax Brand Adaptor

FL-T 400 Fuel tank

FL-T 400 Fuel tank

LV-N Atomic Rocket Motor

TR-18A Stack Decoupler

Rockomax Brand Adaptor

LFB KR-1x2

3 x EAS-1 External Command seats just bellow the parachute but on the MK1-2 Command Pod

9 x Pegasus I Mobility Enhancers around bottom of Pod Leading Horizontally around in a ring (Should fit 9 that way)

3 x Pegasus I Mobility Enhancers 1 each bellow the External command seats leading Vertically

Prior to actual activation of the LFB's, EVA each Kerbal into the External Command seats

then remember to take command of the rocket from the MK1-2 Command pod so that Artificial Horizon etc is set right. (Each kerbal will be reclined nearly vertically due to MK1-2 Pod shape) Bet you already knew that

Launch with them in the External Command seats.

get at least a 100km Orbit then return alive. (if AP and PE are out, never mind. just as long as the PE is above 100km)

All Vanilla no mods Not even MechJeb

It can be done obviously. but what is the best method. Give your view and facts Help a noob.

Bryce.

PS as this is my first post I feel I should Introduce myself (from the deep end)

I live in Australia and purchased KSP for myself and my 9yo son (we have been Playing Minecraft for over a year and I thought this should be a next thing for us)

Look forward to many hours with him and I on KSP and To your replies
